ComicInfo.Summary: Dale was abducted by the hunters, who are eating him piece by piece. It seemed to be a tragic end for Dale but it seems that good old Dale is going to have the last laugh. He left the group due to being bitten by the zombies, and now the hunters are eating his tainted meat.
